cdp_tactical_damage_tooltip: The champion's tendency to deal physical, magic, or mixed damage
cdp_tactical_style_tooltip: The champion's tendency to deal damage to enemy champions using basic attacks vs. abilities
cdp_playstyle_damage_tooltip: The champion's ability to deal damage to enemy champions
cdp_playstyle_toughness_tooltip: The champion's ability to absorb damage from enemy champions
cdp_playstyle_crowd_control_tooltip: The champion's ability to apply harmful effects like slows and stuns to enemy champions
cdp_playstyle_mobility_tooltip: The champion's ability to move quickly around the map using blinks or dashes
cdp_playstyle_utility_tooltip: The champion's ability to grant beneficial effects like shields, healing, or movement speed to allied champions
cdp_progression_mastery_forge_tokens: Forge your mastery tokens in the Loot tab to reach Mastery {{nextLevel}}
cdp_progression_mastery_gain_tokens: Gain mastery tokens with high grades to forge Mastery {{nextLevel}}
cdp_progression_mastery_max_level: This champion is at maximum mastery level.
cdp_progression_mastery_mastery_zero: Play a game with this champion to unlock mastery.
cdp_progression_statstones_load_error: We're sorry, we're having trouble loading this champion's Eternals. Please try closing the page and opening it again to refresh.
cdp_progression_statstones_feature_error: Something went wrong featuring your Eternal. Please try again later.
cdp_progression_statstones_hover_blurb: Perform deeds of valor in the realm of Runeterra and the Celestials will take notice. As you pass milestones, the remnants channel more favor and burn with more intensity.
cdp_progression_statstones_hover_persona: Hit milestone 5 on an Eternal to unlock your per-game Personal Best for that stat!
cdp_progression_statstones_hover_mastery: Hit 15 total milestones in this champion's series to add a fiery upgrade to your Mastery Emote.
cdp_progression_no_statstones_for_champ: Eternals coming soon for this champion. Check back next patch!
cdp_progression_passed_milestones_toolti: Milestones passed this set. Mastery Emote upgrades at 15!
cdp_season_act_tooltip_description: Seasonal Milestone progress will lock at this time
cdp_info_modal_how_description: Play games and get high grades to earn Marks of Mastery, Battle Pass XP, and more!
cdp_info_modal_how_mastery_description: Play games to earn Mastery Points and level up when you've got enough Mastery Points and Mark(s) of Mastery
cdp_info_modal_how_mark_description: Earn high grades to complete Mastery Milestones and earn Mark(s) of Mastery
cdp_info_modal_how_seasonpass_descriptio: Earn Battle Pass XP every time you complete a Mastery Milestone
cdp_info_modal_how_levelup_description: Level up when you've got enough score and marks!
cdp_info_modal_how_champion_title_descri: Unlock Champion Title at Mastery Level 10
cdp_info_modal_how_footer_description: After completing all milestones, you can continue to complete bonus milestones to get extra Marks of Mastery
cdp_mark_container_tooltip: Marks of Mastery can be used to unlock Higher Mastery Levels
cdp_marks_required_tooltip: Complete Milestones to get Marks of Mastery
cdp_mastery_milestone_description: Complete Milestones to get Battle Pass XP
